definitions.definition: The branch of biology dealing with the relationships of organisms with their environment and with each other.
Any study of the relationships of components of a system with their environment and with each other.
The totality or pattern of relationships of components of a system with their environment and with each other.

main_definition: ( biology ) The branch of biology dealing with the relationships of organisms with their environment and with each other.
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) Any study of the relationships of components of a system with their environment and with each other.
The totality or pattern of relationships of components of a system with their environment and with each other.
